title: Paretha X Kumunga
body: Are we all under the assumption that Paretha is Kumunga? It makes sense based on what little I have seen about it, but there are still completely unknown areas still as well.

replies.body: EDIT: I realised calling Kumungu a "region" could cause confusion, when that's how we refer to Demacia, Noxus, the Freljord etc.
Will the name Kumungu be the same or will it be changing?
I'd question the value of changing it, at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8eqHgLAW,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-08T19:02:47.852+0000)
>
> I'd question the value of changing it, at this point.

I feel the same way yeah you could come up with a cooler name or something with cultural significance but the on-the-nose jankiness is part of Leagues' charm. The "good" country is literally named after "Democracy" and the "bad one" sounds like "Noxious". At least they were good and bad before writers moved down the tech tree and unlocked the moral ambiguity skill. Kumungu is fine.

"Unlocked the moral ambiguity skill" is my new favourite phrase...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Also, are you able to confirm Kumungu is the area next to Shurima? Or not yet?
So are you Lady Grey? Do you walk on blade legs?

It absolutely could be a new region... I think if you guys come up with a really cool hook for a jungle region you would think about releasing a new champion from the region. And then place others in that area like nidalee, khazix etc

There's a lot you could do with a rainforest themed area, exploration themes, Mayan archetype stuff, all the crazy wildlife etc
Why would a void creature be from the jungle? Kha'zix is a void character.
He lives in runeterra now. Like how reksai is void but lives in shurima. The jungle is ideal for khazix and it's just east of where rengar lives

It's true. They pay taxes, they've got mortgages.

Kha'Zix works in a shipping depot in Piltover. He doesn't get on too well with his supervisor, but they always make time for a drink after work on a Friday.

That should be a skinline. It would be great,an entire universe where the mighty champions of League just work normal jobs. Maybe along side the Culinary or Gentlemen Skins. 

All that is really needed is to put him in a uniform.

https://i.imgur.com/2ccCClJ.jpg

Would be a great april fools.

{{champion:143}} & {{champion:76}} need love 

I'm happy that you still keep Kumungu and consider it being a faction, hope the new champion will bring some interesting lore updates to the jungles !

I really hope we get a new jungle based region cause while its been awesome exploring more of the current regions I think its time to further the horizon an see some new places and cultures.

Plus having a jungle region makes my hope for a witch doctor like champion all the more likely {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
But we literally have a whole unexplored jungle region already on the map...

sorry what I meant is that i hope the jungle region becomes a official region with its on mythos and everything.
the area is still unexplored and  ,far as we know, doesn't have a name yet .
I'm not dismissing the area , I'm hoping that we'll get to know more about it as extensively as the other regions.
but the same can be said about the void as well... Both are proverbial deadzones as far as information on their actual area is concerned, though Kumungu is worse.

What?
The Void has 4 updated bios, 3 color stories, 2 long stories and a bunch of mentions in other lores. Wthout count the "Visions of the Void" in the Void page and in the map.
Kumungu has what? Rengar's bio and color story that arent even confirmed to be in Kumugu, a possible area in the mpa with 3 Ezreal's notes and just that.
The Void is billions of times more fleshed out than Kumungu. You probally haven't even read Vel'koz's lore to say this.
this is very true.
Also, and I really can't stress this enough... the Void is not literally a place.
I mean the universe page even calls it a realm?

Compared to "the mortal realm" which contains everything in Runeterra, and beyond?

Yes, the Void is a realm. :-)

I mean, it's kind-of a place isn't it? Wasn't Kai'sa stranded in the void as a child only to escape as an adult? I always assumed that the void was a dimension of "nothingness" that swallows up anything it comes in contact with and forces whatever it is to adapt or die.

This has been covered a few times - she didn't literally enter the Void. That would likely have unmade her in an instant.

Your "dimension of nothingness" idea is much closer - check out Vel'Koz and Lissandra's newer lore for more info. :-)

I've just been spitballing thoughts, I haven't had time to completely delve into the lore due to college.  Based on what I have had time to look into the Void and Kumungu just seem to be the most lacking of the "regions" story-wise. 

Really, the point of all the questions I've been asking lately is because I have applied to the narrative opening that was on the careers page. I'm trying to dig deeper than the surface that is currently available, when I have time,  for a Zyra story I want to write, but it really needs an in-depth understanding of Kumungu and the certain societies around it, and it also depends on Zyra's current information not getting retconned. That's another reason why I haven't started writing it yet.

exactly! Kumungu needs love ( one of my love factions) but were just in the tip of the iceburg in terms of "the void" specially in its lore. We do not even have stories about the the void from other places besides runetera's 2 continent and the sea besides mt. targon. Heck maybe even ionia will be damned by the void (we just don't know if it will happen/already happened in secret or for future content). I even have other theories like one continent in runetera larger than valoran was consumed by the void already which I named "The Dark Continent" and Cho'gath will be retconned there as the thing that ruled and conquered there (possibly being the king of that continent), continuing to conquer other continents possibly the whole runetera. I might even connect this to the Great Void War that has happend in the past(clue: read Edward Santangelo's Notes) and all people in runetera joined forces and witness the calamity of the void. Some continents survived(like chilling the frozen watchers,etc.), not harmed(ionia) and destroyed/conqured(The dark continent) but the whole runetera was disturbed by this catastrophe and it reshaped its surroundings/its balance. Maybe at that time people didn't know that they facing a greater bad. 

PS: maybe targon intervened again at this era.

https://youtu.be/rnhOdwT7738

Don't mind me, just continuing my quest to tell the entire lore in prog metal titles.

Though if you want to show appreciation... senpai...

I said "actual area" for a reason. Sure we got information about some of the void champions but we know nothing about the void itself. Why is the void a thing? What is the void? Is it a realm of darkness? Is it a dreamscape of twisting nether like stuff? Is it dark magic that just warps the mental and physical states of those who come into contact with it? The void itself is a deadzone of information, that stories on the champions themselves is not enough to fill.
You know there's literally a page on Universe which gathers everything we currently know about the Void, right? ;-)
I've been slowly sifting through the information there, if it wasn't for college, I'd have fully emersed myself in every scrap of information there already.
Ye I was right, you didnt read Vel'koz's lore.

I had assumed that Kumungu was the entire green area next to Shurima. (since there is a marker in the northern section of that region that has a name very similar and all.) Mostly, I'm worried about my girl Zyra, since she has to take over the world with plants. I'm still waiting for her seeds to take root. :(
Now that I think abou it, Zyra being from this jungle would be a really cool contrast, since the girl who wants to cover the entire world with plants would be right after a desert.
Lol she tries to take over the world with plants tho (Wait a sec... is that you Poison Ivy????)
_From the notes of Captain Teemo..._
your words gives me hope. I wish kumungu would become an official region already. I also wish it wouldn't get renamed because the name is iconic and its a homage to the old places in the map.
can it be soon so Zyra has an actual backstory?
She has a back story, just no short stories outside of her bio.
There is no stupid questions, just stupid people.

"There are no stupid questions, there are only amazing people."

Fixed that for you. Edit: now it reads more accurate too!
Sorry bud, just figured it was fairly senseless to assume Peretha was the new name of the entire Jungle when the map made it pretty clear that it was just an area within said Jungle.

when I looked at the map after everyone was already talking about it, I didn't see it, so unless the map just updated this week I couldn't find it on the map and I looked through the map pretty indepth.
(-_-) Why didn't you just follow the interactive tags with Ezreal's notes? Which were definitely added to the map the same day his new story was released.
Because Ezreal is a toxic idiot who is too big for his britches.
Y'know my initial comment was generally a sarcastic assertion, now I confidently stand behind it.
